attributes.action: Free Britain from the shackles of European imposed 'human rights'
attributes.additional_details:
I want the British government to reject so-called human rights legislation which compels our government to concern itself more with the rights of foreign terror suspects, criminals and illegal immigrants, than with the rights and security of the British people and communities.

Repatriate and extradite Muslim terror suspects and extremists, regardless of how they or their lawyers allege they will be treated when they are returned or extradited to another country.   The security and the rights of the British people must be paramount in their own country.
